SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_PH, USER_GEN, USER_BIR, STATUS, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ADDRESS, FILE_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_PH, USER_GEN, USER_BIR, STATUS, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ADDRESS, FILE_NAME FROM (SELECT A.USER_ID, NVL(A.USER_PWD, '') AS USER_PWD, NVL(A.USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(A.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(A.USER_NICKNAME, '') AS USER_NICKNAME, NVL(A.USER_PH, '') AS USER_PH, NVL(A.USER_GEN, '') AS USER_GEN, NVL(A.USER_BIR, '') AS USER_BIR, NVL(A.STATUS, 'N') STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS UPDATE_DATE, NVL(A.USER_ADDRESS, '') AS USER_ADDRESS, NVL(B.FILE_NAME, '/resources/images/profile.png') AS FILE_NAME FROM G2_USER A, USER_PROFILE_FILE B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID(+)
AND A.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{userId} || '%'
AND A.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{userName} || '%'
AND A.STATUS LIKE '%' || #{status} || '%'
ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) AS CNT FROM G2_USER WHERE 1 = 1
AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{userId} || '%'
AND USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{userName} || '%'
AND STATUS LIKE '%' || #{status} || '%'

SELECT USER_ID, NVL(USER_PWD, '') AS USER_PWD, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(USER_NICKNAME, '') AS USER_NICKNAME, NVL(USER_PH, '') AS USER_PH, NVL(USER_GEN, '') AS USER_GEN, NVL(USER_BIR, '') AS USER_BIR, NVL(STATUS, 'N') STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS UPDATE_DATE, NVL(USER_ADDRESS, '') AS USER_ADDRESS FROM G2_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{value}

SELECT SELLER_ID, BUSINESS_ID, USER_EMAIL, SELLER_PWD, SELLER_SHOP_NAME, SELLER_PH, SELLER_ADDRESS, REG_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, SELLER_ID, BUSINESS_ID, USER_EMAIL, SELLER_PWD, SELLER_SHOP_NAME, SELLER_PH, SELLER_ADDRESS, REG_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT SELLER_ID, NVL(BUSINESS_ID, '') AS BUSINESS_ID, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(SELLER_PWD, '') AS SELLER_PWD, NVL(SELLER_SHOP_NAME, '') AS SELLER_SHOP_NAME, NVL(SELLER_PH, '') AS SELLER_PH, NVL(SELLER_ADDRESS, '') AS SELLER_ADDRESS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(STATUS, 'N') STATUS FROM G2_SELLER WHERE 1 = 1
AND SELLER_ID LIKE '%' || #{sellerId} || '%'
AND SELLER_SHOP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{sellerShopName} || '%'
AND STATUS LIKE '%' || #{status} || '%'
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(SELLER_ID) AS CNT FROM G2_SELLER WHERE 1 = 1
AND SELLER_ID LIKE '%' || #{sellerId} || '%'

SELECT SELLER_ID, NVL(BUSINESS_ID, '') AS BUSINESS_ID, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(SELLER_PWD, '') AS SELLER_PWD, NVL(SELLER_SHOP_NAME, '') AS SELLER_SHOP_NAME, NVL(SELLER_PH, '') AS SELLER_PH, NVL(SELLER_ADDRESS, '') AS SELLER_ADDRESS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(STATUS, 'N') STATUS FROM G2_SELLER WHERE SELLER_ID = #{value}

SELECT TO_CHAR(O.REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AS GIFT_REG_DATE, SUM(TOTAL_CNT) AS GIFT_TOTAL_CNT, SUM(TOTAL_PRICE) AS GIFT_TOTAL_PRICE FROM ORDER_LIST O, PRODUCT_INFO P, PAY_LIST PL WHERE O.PRODUCT_SEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ AND O.ORDER_SEQ = PL.ORDER_ID AND O.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(O.REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(O.REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(O.REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AS RESTO_REG_DATE, COUNT(ORDER_SEQ) AS RESTO_TOTAL_COUNT, SUM(RESTO_DEPOSIT * RESERV_PERSON) AS RESTO_TOTAL_PRICE FROM ORDER_LIST O, RESTO_INFO R WHERE O.R_SEQ = R.R_SEQ AND O.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(O.REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(O.REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') DESC

SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) AS USER_TOTAL_COUNT, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AS USER_REG_DATE FROM G2_USER WHERE USER_ID != 'adm' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') DESC
SELECT COUNT(SELLER_ID) AS SELLER_TOTAL_COUNT, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') AS SELLER_REG_DATE FROM G2_SELLER GROUP BY TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYYMM') DESC

mapper.select: SELECT NVL(A.ORDER_SEQ, '') AS ORDER_SEQ, NVL(A.REVIEW_CONTENT, '') AS REVIEW_CONTENT, NVL(A.REVIEW_SCORE, 0) AS REVIEW_SCORE, NVL(B.R_SEQ, '') AS R_SEQ, NVL(B.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(C.FILE_NAME, '/resources/images/profile.png') AS FILE_NAME, NVL(D.USER_NICKNAME, '') USER_NICKNAME, NVL(B.RESERV_DATE, '') RESERV_DATE FROM ORDER_REVIEW A, ORDER_LIST B, USER_PROFILE_FILE C, G2_USER D WHERE A.ORDER_SEQ = B.ORDER_SEQ AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID(+) AND C.USER_ID(+) = D.USER_ID AND B.USER_ID = D.USER_ID AND B.R_SEQ = #{value} ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC

SELECT NVL(A.ORDER_SEQ, '') AS ORDER_SEQ, NVL(A.REVIEW_CONTENT, '') AS REVIEW_CONTENT, NVL(A.REVIEW_SCORE, 0) AS REVIEW_SCORE, NVL(B.PRODUCT_SEQ, '') AS PRODUCT_SEQ, NVL(B.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(C.FILE_NAME, '/resources/images/profile.png') AS FILE_NAME, NVL(D.USER_NICKNAME, '') USER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DATE FROM ORDER_REVIEW A, ORDER_LIST B, USER_PROFILE_FILE C, G2_USER D WHERE A.ORDER_SEQ = B.ORDER_SEQ AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID(+) AND C.USER_ID(+) = D.USER_ID AND B.USER_ID = D.USER_ID AND B.PRODUCT_SEQ = #{value} ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC
